txt.en: This Easterling appears to have been slain recently
Approach and examine the body
Ingold has learned of an injured farmer who has made his way to the North-gate!
You should patrol the road north and search for survivors in Talath Anor.
The slain body is located on the road in Talath Anor.\n\nYou should examine the body.
Ingold can be found at the northern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold.
Speak with Ingold

'So, Cair Andros has fallen and much of Talath Anor is in ruins. I had heard the rumours but did not wish to believe it so.

'If there are indeed more Gondorians holding out in Talath Anor, we must rescue them. [placeholder], now is the time to part ways.

'You must search Talath Anor for any survivors.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Kneel</rgb> and listen to the injured farmer
The farmer's breaths are short but his words are heavy
Patrol the road north and search for survivors
The path north will be difficult but if there are survivors, you must try and rescue them.
You should patrol the road north and search for survivors in Talath Anor.
You see no signs of survivors yet and should press on
'Quick, a farmer from Talath Anor has come to the North-gate. He is injured and could use some comforting. Please, go to this man and find out what brings him here!'
Continue to patrol the road north and search for survivors
This Easterling appears to have been slain recently.
A slain body nearby catches your attention
Searching for Survivors
Approach and examine the body
The injured farmer can be found at the northern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should kneel and listen to what the injured farmer has to say.
